tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Well qualified and passionate about her work.Friendly, listens patiently and pays attention to details. Makes you comfortable and relaxed and takes you through every step of the check up and treatment process. Ethical code and professional conduct. Has the expertise and does a very good job. No wait time.
The clinic is very well designed -spacious, clean and hygienic.
I would recommend her every time.
Thank you  Doctor Egammai.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Very simple and easy to interact. ****** ************* *** staffs were also very friendly and am much satisfied with the treatment and strongly recommend pearl dental clinic for all the dental problems

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Requested review following 2 tooth implants completed in Jan 2034. Seen immediately- xray - consultation by Dr Eggamai - review procedure done - completed. Did not request any payments. This act speaks volimes of the ethos of the Practice, the passion, dedication and care. The financial selfless act has not been the most influential act towards my admiration but its embodiment of the entire culture. I raise my cap - Dr S Ananthram

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Once I visited casually with my tooth problems. She treated it very well as I underwent root canal treatment and tooth capping. In comparison to similar cases with my friends in other clinics leads to fall of tooth in a little span of time whereas my tooth are still intact without any problems. This treatment I taken almost 3 years back. Due to this faith, I again came back from long distance for my other tooth treatments and undergone tooth root canal treatment and capping and I satisfied a lot. Very well experienced and talented dentist she is.... I recommend others to visit to her with any dental problems and hope u ll get a satisfied result... Thanks

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
context: Endo Surgery Or Apicoectomy,Tooth Coloured Fillings,
review:
Doctor was able to diagnose the problem and proper treatment was provided 
The staff were very courteous

tags: Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I saw Dr. Egammai in June, 2021 for toothache.  She took an x-ray and said that the x-ray showed tooth decay in one of my molars.  She said my best option was to have a root canal procedure and crown. I hesitated to commit to this extensive procedure(s) without a 2nd opinion.  I showed my x-ray to 2 other dentists to get an independent 2nd and 3rd opinion.  **** ******** ********* **** *** *** *** *** ***** ***** *** *********** ******** * **** ***** ***** *** * *** *****  * ******** ***** ************** *** ********* ****** * ****  * **** *** *** * ******* ******  **** ******* *********** * ********* *** ********* ********* ***** ** *** ******** ** *** ***** **** ** ******* ** ***** ** **** ****** ** ****** ** ********* ** *** ***** ******** *** ** ***** *********

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Based on practos feedback..
I had met the docs at pearl..for the tooth filling was worn out...and had to leave out of station  they were not giving any solution...finally requested for temp filling...which was done without utmost care ...they charged 800 rs..they gave only root canal or capping as the option with cost of20k...after my return ...I had gone to another dentist...and he did filling with UV technology...reconstructed my teeth********* ***********money is not an issue...but quality matters...
reply_text: Thank you for the feedback. The treatment was suggested so that it is long lasting,  the condition of your tooth didn't warrant any permanent filling. We are happy that you are fine now with the reconstructed tooth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am extremely satisfied with the treatment given, ambience,friendly nature of every one in the clinic

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had an excellent experience with Dr. S.Egammai and wanted to share my positive feedback. From the moment I entered the clinic, the staff was welcoming and efficient. Dr.S.Egammai demonstrated exceptional professionalism and expertise throughout my dental appointment. They took the time to thoroughly explain procedures, answer my questions, and ensure I felt comfortable. The clinic's cleanliness and adherence to safety protocols also impressed me. Caring and patient-centric approach, making my dental visit a pleasant one.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Implant Fixing,
review: Wonderful experience with Dr. Egammai and her whole team! They were able to fix my long standing dental issues in an extremely short time. I had a root canal, an extraction and an implant procedure. All were done extremely professionally and painlessly - with zero waiting time. Extremely happy with the results and absolutely recommend Pearl Dental and Dr. Egammai for any dental issues.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: This was my first time visit to Pearl dental clinic. Dr Egammai was quick to identify the issue and suggest the course of treatment. She explained the technical jargon in a way that is easily comprehended by a layman. As the treatment is still continuing what I felt very impressive about the doctor and her team is their level of professionalism, agility, care for the patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Prior to visiting Peral Dental, I was not regular with my dental checkups and maintenance of my teeth. Dr.Egammai has been extremely informative about the procedures that were done and also with the care & teeth maintanence to be followed. Now I make it a point to visit atleast once a year for scaling or check up. For anyone who's afraid of visiting Dentists in general, please do not hesitate to try here. You would be surprised that it's actually a pleasant experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: From the entry into the clinic till we come out all treatments like receiving the patient,kind and brief explanation about the treatment by the doctor ,followed by step by treatment according to the health condition of the patient everything really fine.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
thank you for the wonderful work (molar extraction) done by Dr Egammai MDS *** ** ** *********** ******** She took the time to explain every procedure about my molar extraction she was doing in a professional manner and extracted my bad molar teeth in a painless procedure this helped me feel more comfortable and also her staffs are very friendly and helpfull. they maintaining the clinic hygeinically and peace.

l would recommend Dr Egammai MDS to everyone. 
*** ** *** **** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I had an appointment for consultation with Dr. Egammai. I didn't have to wait long. There were staff to direct me which made me feel welcome 
The Doctor was kind, patient and approachable so it made it easy for me to communicate and I was advised treatment in my best interest. This is what one goes to the doctor for. I would recommend her for good treatment. I wish her God's blessings.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Egammai is an expert in what she does. I had RCT and implants done. She and her team are thorough professionals and took utmost care. She was checking if I'm feeling painful at any point through out the procedures which made me so comfortable go through the entire process. Happy smiling with Pearl Dental! Kudos team! Way to go!! I would recommend her to anyone who  needs a good dental care.
reply_text: Thanks a lot Mrs.Sivakami Ramanathan. We are happy to help you spread smiles always.

tags: None
review: A visit to a dentist is always a day that you normally like to forget, but at Pearl Dental the experience was totally different. The ambience was friendly and all staff helpful and courtious. Dr S Egammai and her team did a wonderful job ( removing a decayed tooth/cap and fitting a new one.) Thanks once again
